---
title: "Individual homework (3 hp, grade PASS/FAIL.)"
output: html_document
---

Six homework assignments should be solved and uploaded on GitHub at the latest 23:59 on their respective date of deadline. These should be solved individually. The assignments also involves peer review of another students solution.


```{r, echo =FALSE}
HW <- c(
    #"[HW1: GitHub test-run](HW/HW1.html)",
    "[HW1: GitHub test-run](HW/HW1.html)",
    "HW2: Basic tidyverse",
    "HW3: Working with tables",
    "HW4: Stores and products",
    "HW5: Texts and lists",
    "HW6: Scraping and mapping"
)
deadline <- seq(as.Date("2019/11/10"), by = "week", length.out = 6)
knitr::kable(data.frame(Homework = HW, Deadline = deadline))
```
